data.title: Mitch Daniels
data.text:
AKA Mitchell Elias Daniels, Jr.

Born: 7-Apr-1949

Birthplace: Monongahela, PA

Gender: Male

Religion: Presbyterian

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Politician

Party Affiliation: Republican

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Governor of Indiana

Father: Mitchell E. Daniels, Sr. (drug company salesman, d. 5-Aug-2004)

Mother: Dorothy Wilkes ("Dottie", d.)

Sister: Deborah Daniels (assistant US attorney general)

Wife: Cheri Lynn Herman (m. 1978, div., remarried)

Daughter: Meagan E. Daniels

Daughter: Melissa E. Daniels

Daughter: Meredith E. Daniels

Daughter: Maggie E. Daniels

High School: North Central High School, Indianapolis, IN (1967)

University: BA, Princeton University (1971)

Law School: Indiana University

Law School: JD, Georgetown University (1979)

Governor of Indiana (2005-)

US National Security Council (2001-03)

US Director, Office of Management and Budget (2001-03)

Eli Lilly Senior VP Corporate Strategy and Policy (1997-2000)

Eli Lilly President North American Pharmaceutical Operations (1993-97)

Eli Lilly VP Corporate Affairs (1990-93)

Fund for American Studies Board of Trustees

Hudson Institute EVP and CEO (1987-90)

Drug Possession: LSD 14-May-1970 (charge dropped)

Drug Possession: Marijuana 14-May-1970 (charge dropped)

Drug Possession Prescription drugs, 14-May-1970 (charge dropped)

Maintaining a common nuisance 14-May-1970 (pled guilty in plea bargain)

Dubya Nickname The Blade

Global Warming Skeptics C-SPAN appearance (4-Apr-2010)

Syrian Ancestry

Risk Factors: Marijuana
